page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Games Children Play Many versions of chase and catch games are popular in the school playground. The safe base varies,it can be off ground,touch wood,on a line or many other ideas. Hop-Scotch is played all the year round. Squares numbered 1 to 10 are marked on the ground.The player has a flat stone which is aimed into the squares beginning at 1,if it goes on the line a turn is lost.The player then hops in each square.On the return the stone is picked up and aimed into square 2. and so on.{Please,please Mr. {Crocodile May we cross the river {Before its nine o'clock Or we'll be {late for school?}One child is Mr Crocodile, the others stand in a line .Mr. Crocodile names a colour,the first child wearing it to reach Mr.Crocodile is the caller next time.
